title: Royal Enfield launches adventure tourer 'Himalayan' for  Rs 2.69 lakh in India. Check features here
description: Royal Enfield has launched its adventure tourer, the Himalayan, at a price of Rs 2.69 lakh in India until December 31, 2023. The motorcycle is available in three variants: Base, Pass, and Summit, and comes in five color options. The Himalayan was developed based on the feedback of the brand's community and its own journey in the Himalayas.
